import React,{useState}from"react";import"./App.css";// Import the styles
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[a,setA]=useState("");const[b,setB]=useState("");const[result,setResult]=useState(null);const handleCalculation=async operation=>{if(a===""||b===""){alert("Please enter both numbers!");return;}try{const res=await fetch("http://localhost:8080/".concat(operation,"?a=").concat(a,"&b=").concat(b));const data=await res.json();setResult(data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching result:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"calculator",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"React Calculator"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:a,onChange:e=>setA(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter first number"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:b,onChange:e=>setB(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter second number"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleCalculation("add"),children:"Add"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleCalculation("subtract"),children:"Subtract"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleCalculation("multiply"),children:"Multiply"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleCalculation("divide"),children:"Divide"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Result: ",result!==null?result:"No result yet"]})]});}export default App;
